name: The Coca-Cola Company
brief_description: The Coca‑Cola Company is a total beverage company with products sold in more than 200 countries and territories. They sell multiple billion-dollar brands across several beverage categories worldwide including Coca‑Cola, Sprite, Fanta, Dasani, smartwater, vitaminwater, Topo Chico, BODYARMOR, Powerade, Costa, Georgia, Gold Peak, Ayataka, Minute Maid, Simply, innocent, Del Valle, fairlife and AdeS.
services: Providing a variety of beverage products including soft drinks, water, sports drinks, coffee, tea, juice, value-added dairy, and plant-based beverages. They also practice sustainable sourcing, packaging recycling, and carbon emissions reduction.
